patthana16.21:1.1: Kusalaṃ cittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.21:2.1: Akusalaṃ cittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.21:3.1: Abyākataṃ cittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana16.21:4.1: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
patthana16.21:5.1: Kusalaṃ nocittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nanocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.21:6.1: Akusalaṃ nocittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nanocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.21:7.1: Abyākataṃ nocittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nanocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana16.21:8.1: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
